content: I don't have personal preferences or opinions, but i can tell you that all the dessert places in banff offer unique and delicious treats that are worth trying. it really depends on what you're in the mood for! if you're craving fudge, then the fudgery is a must-visit. if you want to taste a canadian speciality pastry, then head to beavertails. if you love chocolate, then choco cafe is the place to be. if you're a fan of ice cream, then you can't go wrong with cows ice cream. wild flour bakery and la belle patate also have a wide variety of delicious desserts to choose from.
